reviews.review: its really good and best with friends, there is a grind aspect to it but it balances everything perfectly, no pay to win, great community, and overall a great game that deserve a spot on any gamers wishlist
It's so good it provides a stim of adrenaline, fright, and excitement in a well blended game mix.

玩了快两百小时了，算是一个入门级选手了，来评价一下吧
首先，制作组真的是很积极地听取玩家的意见，你用英文去给他们写邮件基本都会得到回复，对中国玩家也很友好。来过上海办过展览，有为中国玩家定制的皮肤，以及发过网页让玩家投票接下来要出的中国风杀手，最后也出了。游戏有和很多恐怖电影联动，有很多恐怖电影里的角色。
小问题很多，小bug和大bug都有，游戏优化的不是很好，甚至连国服都没有，家里200兆的宽带开个加速器也有100ms的延迟，但是即使是这样，对这个游戏的热爱还是挥之不去。能理解behavior是小作坊，就单单凭着他们不摆烂，能放下身子与玩家交流这一点，我就愿意一直支持下去。
然后接下来这段话是写给萌新的，这个游戏对新人并不是很友好，新人技能比较少，套路也懂得不是很多，新人入坑的话建议先玩屠夫，玩一玩幽灵杀手这种比较强势，上手难度不会很难的屠夫。心态一定要好，比如告诉自己这把我杀一个人就算成功，玩游戏嘛，自己开心最重要。人类的话要多看b站人皇的视频，学习卡视角和与屠夫博弈的技巧，总之人类想要玩好还是比较难的。
祝大伙玩的开心。
Jogo muito bom, hitbox bem favorável ao sobrevivente, duro na queda muito eficaz. Jogo muito divertido, nunca me irritei :)

se vc não se importa com sua sanidade mental e quiser jogar um jogo com um matchmaking que te bota contra caras 10 ranks mais altos que vc, que são extremamente insuportáveis e vão te tirar do sério, recomendo muito. se vc realmente quiser se divertir e ter uma experiência boa, joga em lobby fechado com 5 amigos.
275 Hours too many. This game is as distructive to your mental health as a cocaine addiction. Please stay away.

The asymmetric nature of this game leads to very *passionate* players who main one play style over another. Some games (and players) can be frustrating to play with, but if you don't let other people's "rules" dictate how you play, you'll have a great time. I keep coming back for more. Just beware of the negativity some players have and don't let it rub off on you :)

The devs gave up on the game and stopped trying to make the game better. SBMM has made games unfun and the community more toxic making the overall enjoyment off this game disappear . I miss the old dbd

One of the barriers I had to playing this game was that it's been around for 5 years and I thought I might fall behind others. While yeah some people have better perks than I do after starting during the 5 year anniversary event, I can still either survive as a survivor or get kills, even wiping an entire group as a killer even without those same perks or items. This game is great for both new players and those who have played throughout the years. My partner and I both picked up this game during the summer sale this year (2021) and have loved every moment of it (minus the players that DC).

This game is severely underrated to a lot of people. I personally am in love with this game. I love that the developers are on top of the content, updates. Sure the matchmaking could be better. Sometimes i will be put in with completely different ranks in certain matches (Like 2 ranks above or below me). But really besides sometimes the occasional lagging from maybe the host of the lobbies. Its a game that i can dump hours of my day/night into. 

Much love to the developers and community <3

Mir persönlich gefällt das Spiel sehr und es kann sehr viel Spaß machen, da es in seiner Art einzigartig und sehr kreativ ist. Dazu kommen auch noch die Lizensierten Characktere, die zum Spielvibe mitbeitragen. 
Jedoch muss ich jedem abraten, das Spiel zu holen, der es neu lernen möchte. Die Gameengine ist veraltet und das gesamte Spiel protzt nur so vor gamebreaking Bugs, die entweder sehr später oder garnicht behoben werden. Durch die Individualität des Spiels gibt es auch keine Konkurrenz für das Spiel, sodass die Devs auch nicht über Konkurrenz fürchten müssen.
Das Game überlebt im Moment nurnoch dadurch, dass die Devs ein neues DLC nach dem anderen rausballern, um die Spielerbase irgendwie bei laune zu halten. Dabei wird die alte Engine immer verälteter, bis es nurnoch eine Frage der Zeit ist, dass das Spiel garnicht mehr funktionieren wird. 
Deshalb kann ich es auch nicht weiterempfehlen, die tage von Dead by Daylight sind balt gezählt, da es, durch die Entscheidungen der Devs, bald unspielbar wird. 
Investiert das Geld, die Zeit und die Anstrengung  lieber in ein Game das nicht kurz vor dem Absturz steht.
Fun, but horribly bugged and unbalanced.

fun game and in a really good place right now. Tons of characters to choose from whether you play killer or survivor and a lot of perks to use. If you like grinding there is a massive amount of things to work for and you realistically dont have to spend a dime on the game outside of the original purchase.

this is a fun game to play with friends and family, and to learn teamwork skills.

What are the positives of this game? Its the best of its genre at the moment. Which isnt saying much, because the asymmetrical horror genre is pretty small and niche anyways. The game is full of bugs. You pretty much cant play on console at the moment because the lag and disconnect issues are so bad. Its addictive but long term the game is going downhill.
Jogo muito bom, principalmente com amigos. Um pouco mal otimizado em algumas partes, mas não influencia de maneira drástica.  Adrenalina básica!

Если в кратце, то в игре у вас 2 пути. Первый: вы маньячела который бегает за 4-мя чуваками и такой:- ВАБА ДУБУ БАБА ПИЗДЕЦ ВАМ, СЕЙЧАС Я БУДУ ВАС УБИВАТЬ. Вы типа такой жёсткий ебарь-террорист. Второй путь. Вы зайка, паинька, бегаете себе, чините генераторы, пытаетесь съебать как можно скорее. И при этом вас преследует маньяк педофил, который поимеет вас даже не поинтересовавшись у вас, имеете ли вы к нему взаимность. Вообщем и целом игра вполне себе. Ну на деле там конечно же всё не так просто. Куча разных предметов, влияющих на то, пизда вам или нет. Куча персонажей со своими индивидуальными способностями. Смущает только донат, но в принципе можно обойтись и без него. Игра заэбиса, определённо советую.

Juego entretenido que lo disfrutas mas con amigos y con audifonos para que puedas jugar de mejor manera,
Tambien se disfruta en solitario si juegas como asesino, lo unico malo es que algunos jugadores se toman las cosas muy enserio y te insultan por perder o ganar.
Pero en general recomendable.

Other then a few bugs / glitches here and there its enjoyable i do personally think that there should be a reprimand for tunnel vision killers and face campers. Especially cause lower ranked survs will go against the killers more likely to do so in game, this makes it extremely annoying for new players trying to get into the game and will make them not want to continue to play.
